item.description:
Oh my, the front (green) sections are already selling out at McCoy.

The Pawsox won their division last year,  hoping to see them repeat the effort this year. On opening day they will be playing the Buffalo Bisons.  The Bisons were at the other end of the division with a record almost exactly opposite the Pawsox.  And Channel 10 is doing the pre game ceremony.  (So be careful about singing along with the ceremony or at other points in the game, you might end up on TV like Jeff G. did a while back)

I'm planning to get tickets in Section 8 Red. We should be under cover there (you never know when you need it with New England spring weather), and have a good view down the first base line.  I'll probably purchase tickets within the week, so we can get seats in the reserved section.  I'll post more details when I've bought tickets (what section they are in, who's paid, etc).

The game is scheduled to start at 7:05.  Tickets in the reserved sections are $11.  Contact me for payment options :-)

 

-John
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a Virginia Tech hat (as usual), and wait for anyone that doesn't have their ticket at the main gate.
item.name: Pawsox Opening Day
